basic.description:
In this course, we examine the syntax of standard French and of Canadian French from a generative grammar perspective. The study of syntax will be explained, as well as the various properties of language that form the object of syntactic analysis. We will discover what a grammatical theory can show us about the grammar of French and consider some specific questions raised by the syntax of Canadian French.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Syntaxe du français canadien

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite       (FREN230 and FREN241) or FREN221 or (FREN220 and FREN212) or FREN215.
